content:
Scenario: Connecting with IDD peers for mutual support
    Given Jordan wants to meet other IDD community members
    And peer connection is essential for Jordan's wellbeing
    When Jordan uses the peer connection feature
    Then the interface shows nearby IDD peers with similar interests
    And profiles use accessible format (pictures, simple descriptions)
    And Jordan can express interest in connecting
    And the community_elohim facilitates introductions with support
    And Jordan builds friendships with people who truly understand
    And Jordan experiences IDD community belonging and pride
